creditline: The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art
description: torque with seven rings of consecutive sizes; rings end in curlicues; top curlicue has sphere in the middle of it; connecting piece has three cones on it; rings are decorated with six panels, left to right: rat(?), goat, goat(?), rabbit, dragon, and snake, horse(?), and goat, monkey, and rooster, goat(?), and dog
title: Torque
